EmailTemplate.subject: Digital Dealer 14 $200 Discount Code, Register Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Digital Dealer 14 is right around the corner, May 7th - 9th in Orlando at the Rosen Shingle Creek Hotel and Convention Center. We hope you see you and your dealership in attendance. When you register for DD14, remember to use the Vin VIP discount code for $200.00 off.
When registering, be sure to apply our rate code "DD14VSOLUTIONSEB" in the ‘have a rate code’ field of the first registration page to let them know VinSolutions referred you!" This code will give you a discount of $200.00 off the regular registration price!
We look forward to seeing you in Orlando!
